## createExposition() function

Create an Exposition with all necessary data üîÆ

‚ú® Cast the input config `as const` to get full type support

- The key of the entry will be used for the name of the `Scenario` - The first `options` value will be set as the `initialValue` of the `Scenario`

